Name: Improved Bronx
Ingredients: 30 ml Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of tangerine/mandarin wedge on rim.
Review: Delicate, fragrant fruity notes from freshly squeezed tangerine/mandarin juice freshen this version of the classic Bronx . My recipe for both versions of the Bronx are the same, it's just the use of tangerine/mandarin/clementine orange juice that denotes this "Improved".
Nutrition: One serving of Improved Bronx contains 166 calories
